itemdesc-snowshoes-plain:
A very simple, yet effective way of besting the unforgiving winter.

Seems like its laces will require some reconditioning once in a while, otherwise the shoes will become less effective
itemdesc-snowshoes-fur:
Snowshoes improvised with knee-high fur boots.

Very straight forward, and no more frozen feet! Can be reconditioned the same way as regular fur boots
